Package client.stubs.refereesite

Class RefereeSiteStub

java.lang.Object
client.stubs.refereesite.RefereeSiteStub
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRefereeSiteStub, IRefereeSiteStub_Coach, IRefereeSiteStub_Referee
public class RefereeSiteStub extends Object implements IRefereeSiteStub
Implementation of the playground stub.

It instantiates a remote reference to the playground server.

    • callTrial

      public void callTrial()
      The referee calls the trial. The referee waits for the coaches to be ready to receive the command to call the trial. The coaches will know the match has not ended.
      Specified by:
      callTrial in interface IRefereeSiteStub_Referee

    • declareMatchWinner

      public void declareMatchWinner(int team)
      The referee declares the team that won the match. The referee waits for the coaches to be ready to receive the command to declare the match winner. The coaches will know the match has ended.
      Specified by:
      declareMatchWinner in interface IRefereeSiteStub_Referee
      Parameters:
      team - the team that won the match
